sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) as UTC_TAG_COUNT FROM log.source_register_table
WHERE ETL_UTC_TAG > '@{pipeline().parameters.Master_Utc_Tag}'
AND (ETL_IS_PROCESSED = 'N' AND ETL_RUN_STATUS IS NOT NULL)
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and etl_run_status is not null
			   and etl_utc_tag > '@{pipeline().parameters.Master_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as ErrorDuringProcess_Files
;

properties.description: Move files from one folder to another folder

activities.name: ForEachFile
activities.description: Iterate each file, and move them one by one.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTREC
  FROM [log].[Source_Register_Table]
  WHERE [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] = '@{item().name}'
  AND [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'

activities.name: FilterFiles
activities.description: Only files will be selected, the source-folders will not be selected.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME AS TARGET_BLOB_NAME 
FROM LOG.SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE 
WHERE ETL_IS_PROCESSED = 'E'
AND DATEDIFF(DAY,INSERT_TIMESTAMP,CONVERT(smalldatetime,CONVERT(datetimeoffset, SYSDATETIME()) AT TIME ZONE 'AUS Eastern Standard Time')) < 8

  AND [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N' AND ETL_RUN_STATUS = 'FAILED'

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'Y'
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and etl_utc_tag is null
			   and original_blob_name like '@{pipeline().parameters.File_Pattern}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Not_Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and (etl_run_status like 'FAIL%' or etl_run_status like 'RUN%')
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as ErrorDuringProcess_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'Y'
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and original_blob_name like '@{pipeline().parameters.File_Pattern}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as Not_Processed_Files
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and etl_run_status like 'FAIL%'
			   and etl_utc_tag = '@{pipeline().parameters.Etl_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as ErrorDuringProcess_Files
;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TOP 1 [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'ADJ_MNL_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME, RUNNING_STATE FROM (
SELECT ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME, 1 AS RUNNING_STATE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_RUN_STATUS] = 'RUNNING'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'ADJ_MNL_%'
UNION
SELECT 'NO FILE' AS ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME, 0 AS RUNNING_STATE
)x
ORDER BY RUNNING_STATE DESC;

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[COA_Adjustments]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'OPS_SALES_UNIT_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Sales_Unit]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'OPS_TIMBER_SALES_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Timber_Sales]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'TGR % spEst %'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [Fund_ID]
      ,[Asset_ID]
      ,[DatabaseName]
      ,[Group_ID]
      ,[Attribute_id]
      ,[Origin_id]
      ,[Asset_Offset]
      ,[Version_name]
      ,[IsProcessed]
	  ,'sp_FSOPConsolidated' AS sp_FSOPConsolidated
	  ,'sp_FSOPEstate' AS sp_FSOPEstate
	  ,'sp_FSOPOther' AS sp_FSOPOther
      ,CONCAT('TGR ', Fund_ID, ' ', Asset_ID, ' ', Version_name, ' spCon ', FORMAT(START_DATETIME,'yyyyMMdd hhmm'),'.csv') AS TargetFileName_spFSOPConsolidated
      ,CONCAT('TGR ', Fund_ID, ' ', Asset_ID, ' ', Version_name, ' spEst ', FORMAT(START_DATETIME,'yyyyMMdd hhmm'),'.csv') AS TargetFileName_spFSOPEstate
      ,CONCAT('TGR ', Fund_ID, ' ', Asset_ID, ' ', Version_name, ' spOth ', FORMAT(START_DATETIME,'yyyyMMdd hhmm'),'.csv') AS TargetFileName_spFSOPOther
      ,CONCAT('TGR ', Fund_ID, ' ', Asset_ID, ' ', Version_name, ' param ', FORMAT(START_DATETIME,'yyyyMMdd hhmm'),'.csv') AS TargetFileName_param
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0
SELECT (SELECT Value FROM dbo.tbl_parameter WHERE Parameter = 'DescriptionYear') AS DescriptionYear ,  (SELECT Value FROM dbo.tbl_parameter WHERE Parameter = 'YearOffset') AS YearOffset

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'TGR % spCon %'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'TGR % spOth %'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'TGR % param %'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT VERSION_NAME, COUNT(*) AS TO_PROCESS
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0
GROUP BY VERSION_NAME

SELECT VERSION_NAME, COUNT(*) AS TO_PROCESS
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0
GROUP BY VERSION_NAME

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TO_PROCESS
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0

SELECT CASE WHEN OFFSET_ERROR IS NULL THEN '' ELSE OFFSET_ERROR END AS OFFSET_ERROR FROM (
SELECT 
stuff( (SELECT ', '+CONCAT(FAR.Fund_ID,'  ',FAR.Asset_ID,'  ',FAR.Version_name,
'  Asset-Ref-Asset-Offset: ',FAR.Asset_Offset,'  Parameter-Asset-Offset: ',FCP.Asset_offset)
FROM relational.Forecast_Asset_reference FAR
JOIN staging.Forecast_Param FCP
ON FAR.Fund_ID = FCP.Fund_ID AND FAR.Asset_ID = FCP.Asset_ID 
AND FAR.Version_name = FCP.Version_name
WHERE FAR.Asset_Offset < CAST(FCP.Asset_offset AS INT) 
AND FAR.record_deleted_flag = 0 AND FAR.IsProcessed = 0
ORDER BY FAR.Version_name
FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') AS OFFSET_ERROR
)x

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT TRX.[Trx_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Code]\n      ,TRX.[Fund_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Asset_ID]\n      ,TRX.[GL_Code]\n      ,CASE WHEN COA.GL_Code IS NOT NULL THEN COA.[Cash_Flow_Code] ELSE TRX.Cash_Flow_Code END AS Cash_Flow_Code\n      ,TRX.[Debit_Credit]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Type]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Date]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Desc]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Amount]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions] TRX\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Chart_of_Account] COA\n  ON TRX.GL_Code = COA.GL_Code AND COA.record_deleted_flag = 0\n  WHERE TRX.[record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND DATEDIFF(DAY,TRX.Update_datetime,CONVERT(smalldatetime,CONVERT(datetimeoffset, SYSDATETIME()) AT TIME ZONE \'AUS Eastern Standard Time\')) <= 365',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Trx_Code]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Trx_Type]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND [Trx_Type] = \'Actual\'\n  AND [Trx_Desc] = \'Beginning Balance:\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDBbeginningbalanceonly
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(StagingChecksum == Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Trx_ID = Trx_ID,
		Relation_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_Debit_Credit = Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		Relation_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		Relation_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc,
		Relation_Trx_Amount = Trx_Amount,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@TrxCodeNotBeginningBalance select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow, SelectBeginingBalanceColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionNewTransactions
AddAuditColumns select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutput
RelationDBbeginningbalanceonly select(mapColumn(
		RelationBB_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		RelationBB_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		RelationBB_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		RelationBB_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		RelationBB_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		RelationBB_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		RelationBB_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDBcolumnsBeginningBalance
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow split(Trx_Type != 'Actual' || Trx_Desc != 'Beginning Balance:',
	disjoint: false) ~> IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@(TrxCodeNotBeginningBalance, TrxCodeBeginningBalance)
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@TrxCodeBeginningBalance, SelectDBcolumnsBeginningBalance lookup(Trx_Code == RelationBB_Trx_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupDBbeginningBalance
LookupDBbeginningBalance split(isNull(RelationBB_Trx_Code),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsTrxCodeBeginningBalanceExist@(NewTrxCodeBeginningBalance, ExistingTrxCodeBeginningBalance)
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalanceExist@NewTrxCodeBeginningBalance select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBeginingBalanceColumns
UnionNewTransactions derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
SelectOutput alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==0)) ~> AlterRowInsert
AlterRowInsert sink(input(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string,
		Start_Date_Tag as date,
		End_Date_Tag as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertRecords

properties.description: NOTE:This DF only cater for INSERT. There is no Update to Expire for consideration The branch containing "UpdateSelectForExpire" kept for reference only

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Trx_ID]\n      ,[Trx_Code]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n      ,[Debit_Credit]\n      ,[Trx_Type]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n      ,[Trx_Amount]\n      ,[Update_datetime]\n      ,[record_deleted_flag]\n      ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions]\n  WHERE [Trx_Type] != \'Actual\'\n  AND[record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(StagingChecksum == Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	Debit_Credit!=Relation_Debit_Credit || Trx_Amount!=Relation_Trx_Amount,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Trx_ID = Trx_ID,
		Relation_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_Debit_Credit = Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		Relation_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		Relation_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc,
		Relation_Trx_Amount = Trx_Amount,
		Relation_Update_datetime = Update_datetime,
		Relation_record_deleted_flag = record_deleted_flag,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-',$ProcessName,$FileName),
		insert_update_flag = toString('I'),
		Trx_ID = toLong(null())) ~> AddAuditColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-', $ProcessName, $FileName),
		insert_update_flag = toString('I'),
		Trx_ID = toLong(null())) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1),
		insert_update_flag = toString('U')) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		Trx_ID,
		insert_update_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code = Relation_Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		GL_Code = Relation_GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Relation_Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit = Relation_Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Type = Relation_Trx_Type,
		Trx_Date = Relation_Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc = Relation_Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount = Relation_Trx_Amount,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		Update_datetime = Relation_Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		Trx_ID = Relation_Trx_ID,
		insert_update_flag
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
UnionForDB select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		Trx_ID,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutput
SelectOutput sink(input(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as string,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as string,
		Trx_ID as string,
		Update_datetime as string,
		record_deleted_flag as string,
		process_name as string,
		insert_update_flag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AdjustmentLoadReadyFile.txt'],
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		Trx_ID,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> InsertUpdateRecords

parameters{

}
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,

		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,

		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',

source(output(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,

		Budget_ID as long,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Type as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Version_Name]\n      ,[Budget_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n      ,[Debit_Credit]\n      ,[Budget_Type]\n      ,[Budget_Date]\n      ,[Budget_Desc]\n      ,[Budget_value]\n      ,[Update_datetime]\n      ,[record_deleted_flag]\n      ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Budgets]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Budget_Date,Budget_Type,Version_Name)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(StagingChecksum == Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Budget_Date,Budget_Type,Version_Name)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	Debit_Credit!=Relation_Debit_Credit || Budget_value!=Relation_Budget_value || Budget_Desc!=Relation_Budget_Desc,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Version_Name = Version_Name,
		Relation_Budget_ID = Budget_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_Debit_Credit = Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Budget_Type = Budget_Type,
		Relation_Budget_Date = Budget_Date,
		Relation_Budget_Desc = Budget_Desc,
		Relation_Budget_value = Budget_value,
		Relation_Update_datetime = Update_datetime,
		Relation_record_deleted_flag = record_deleted_flag,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Version_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-',$ProcessName,$FileName),
		insert_update_flag = toString('I'),
		Budget_ID = toLong(null())) ~> AddAuditColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-', $ProcessName, $FileName),
		insert_update_flag = toString('I'),
		Budget_ID = toLong(null())) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1),
		insert_update_flag = toString('U')) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag,
		Budget_ID,
		Version_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForInsert, UpdateSelectForExpire union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Budget_ID = Relation_Budget_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		GL_Code = Relation_GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Relation_Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit = Relation_Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Type = Relation_Budget_Type,
		Budget_Date = Relation_Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc = Relation_Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value = Relation_Budget_value,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		Update_datetime = Relation_Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		insert_update_flag,
		Version_Name = Relation_Version_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
UnionForDB select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Budget_Date,
		Budget_Desc,
		Budget_value,
		Budget_Type,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag,
		Budget_ID,
		Version_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectOutput

		Update_datetime as string,
		record_deleted_flag as string,
		process_name as string,
		insert_update_flag as string,
		Budget_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['BudgetLoadReadyFile.txt'],
	mapColumn(
		Version_Name,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,

		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,

	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> InsertUpdateRecords

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		Cash_Flow_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '  SELECT CASE WHEN Trx_Desc = \'Beginning Balance:\' THEN CONCAT(TRX.[Trx_Code],\'-\',FUN.[Fund_ID]) ELSE Trx_Code END AS Trx_Code\n      ,FUN.[Fund_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Asset_ID]\n	  ,TRX.GL_Code\n      ,[Debit_Credit]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n      ,[Trx_Amount]\n	  ,CASE WHEN COA.[GL_Code] IS NULL THEN \'NO GL_CODE DURING LOAD\' ELSE COA.[Cash_Flow_Code] END AS Cash_Flow_Code\n  FROM [staging].[COA_Transactions] TRX\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Chart_of_Account] COA\n  ON TRX.[GL_Code] = COA.[GL_Code] AND COA.[record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Fund] FUN\n  ON TRX.[Fund_ID] = FUN.[Company_Name] AND FUN.[record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Asset] ASS\n  ON TRX.[Asset_ID] = ASS.[Asset_ID] AND FUN.[Fund_ID] = ASS.[Fund_ID] AND ASS.[record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Trx_ID]\n      ,[Trx_Code]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n      ,[Debit_Credit]\n      ,[Trx_Type]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n      ,[Trx_Amount]\n      ,[Update_datetime]\n      ,[record_deleted_flag]\n      ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND [Trx_Type] = \'Actual\'\n  AND DATEDIFF(DAY,Update_datetime,CONVERT(smalldatetime,CONVERT(datetimeoffset, SYSDATETIME()) AT TIME ZONE \'AUS Eastern Standard Time\')) <= 365',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Trx_Code]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Trx_Type]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND [Trx_Type] = \'Actual\'\n  AND [Trx_Desc] = \'Beginning Balance:\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDBbeginningbalanceonly
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Debit_Credit,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Trx_Amount)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(StagingChecksum == Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Debit_Credit,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Trx_Amount)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Trx_ID = Trx_ID,
		Relation_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_Debit_Credit = Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		Relation_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		Relation_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc,
		Relation_Trx_Amount = Trx_Amount,
		Relation_Update_datetime = Update_datetime,
		Relation_record_deleted_flag = record_deleted_flag,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@TrxCodeNotBeginningBalance select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount,
		Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Period_Date as timestamp,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Perpetual_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Current_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Future_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Forecast_Type as string,
		Version_name as string,
		UOM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT \n --REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS REF_ASSET_OFFSET , PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS PAR_ASSET_OFFSET, PAR.DESC_YEAR, DAT.PERIOD,\n CASE WHEN REF.ASSET_OFFSET = PAR.ASSET_OFFSET \n          THEN DATEADD(YEAR,CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)+( CAST(DAT.PERIOD AS INT) - 1 ),CAST(CONCAT(PAR.DESC_YEAR,\'-01-01\') AS DATETIME)) \n          ELSE DATEADD(YEAR,CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)-CAST(PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)+( CAST(DAT.PERIOD AS INT) - 1 ),CAST(CONCAT(PAR.DESC_YEAR,\'-01-01\') AS DATETIME)) \n END AS Period_Date,\n REF.FUND_ID AS Fund_ID,\n REF.ASSET_ID AS Asset_ID,\n DAT.STATUS AS Status, \n DAT.PRODUCT AS Product, \n CASE WHEN PRD.GL_CODE IS NULL THEN \'IGNORE\' ELSE PRD.GL_CODE END AS GL_Code,\n CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(100)) AS Cash_Flow_Code,\n ABS(( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) )) AS Perpetual_Amount,\n CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) AS Current_Amount, \n CAST(CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) AS Future_Amount,\n CASE WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'DR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'DR\'\n      WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'DR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) < 0 THEN \'CR\'\n	  WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'CR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'CR\'\n	  WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'CR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) < 0 THEN \'DR\'\n	  WHEN COA.DEBIT_CREDIT IS NULL AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'DR\'\n	  ELSE \'CR\'\n END AS Debit_Credit,\n-- CASE WHEN ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'DR\' ElSE \'CR\' END AS Debit_Credit,\n \'Forecast\' AS Forecast_Type,\n REF.VERSION_NAME AS Version_name,\n DAT.UOM\nFROM RELATIONAL.FORECAST_ASSET_REFERENCE REF\nJOIN STAGING.FORECAST_PARAM PAR\nON REF.FUND_ID = PAR.FUND_ID AND REF.ASSET_ID = PAR.ASSET_ID AND REF.VERSION_NAME = PAR.VERSION_NAME \nJOIN STAGING.FORECAST_DATA DAT\nON REF.FUND_ID = DAT.FUND_ID AND REF.ASSET_ID = DAT.ASSET_ID AND REF.VERSION_NAME = DAT.VERSION_NAME \nLEFT JOIN RELATIONAL.FORECAST_GL_PRODUCT_MAP PRD\nON DAT.FUND_ID = PRD.FUND_ID AND DAT.ASSET_ID = PRD.ASSET_ID AND DAT.STATUS = PRD.STATUS AND DAT.PRODUCT = PRD.Product AND PRD.RECORD_DELETED_FLAG = 0\nLEFT JOIN RELATIONAL.CHART_OF_ACCOUNT COA\nON PRD.GL_CODE = COA.GL_CODE AND COA.RECORD_DELETED_FLAG = 0\nWHERE REF.ISPROCESSED = 0 AND REF.RECORD_DELETED_FLAG = 0 \nAND DAT.STATUS != \'\' AND DAT.STATUS IS NOT NULL\nAND CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT) >= CAST(PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB

		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,

		GL_Code,

		Perpetual_Amount,
		Current_Amount,
		Future_Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Forecast_Type,
		Version_name,
		UOM
	),

	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow

		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sale_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Species_Code as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Quantity as string,
		Sales_Revenue as string,
		Production_Cost as string,
		Stumpage as string,
		Unit_Stumpage as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB
